data.fullContent: Physical therapists (PTs) treat injuries, illnesses, and disabilities to help patients achieve the maximum level of physical functioning and independence. PTs assess and treat patients. They use a variety of methods to help them learn more about their bodies through the use of exercise, heat, water, and electricity. PTs also use massage and therapeutic exercise. As part of their job, PTs have the potential to work in a variety of settings, including hospitals, outpatient clinics, schools, and nursing homes. They may also work in private practice to aid people with chronic conditions such as bad backs or balance problems. PTs may also be consultants to other medical professionals or work in research to evaluate new treatments.

q1.translation: 物理治疗师(PTs)治疗创伤、疾病和残疾，以帮助患者达到身体功能和独立的最大程度。PTs评估和治疗病人。他们使用各种各样的方法，通过运动、热量、水和电来帮助他们更多地了解自己的身体。
q1.front: Physical therapists (PTs) treat injuries, illnesses, and disabilities to help patients achieve the maximum level of physical functioning and independence. PTs assess and treat patients. They use a variety of methods to help them learn more about their bodies through the use of exercise, heat, water, and electricity.
q1.content: Physical therapists (PTs) ____ injuries, illnesses, and disabilities to help patients achieve the maximum ____ of physical functioning and independence. PTs assess and treat ____. They use a ____ of methods to ____ them learn more about their bodies ____ the use of exercise, heat, ____, and electricity.

q2.translation: 物理治疗师(PTs)治疗创伤、疾病和残疾，以帮助患者达到身体功能和独立的最大程度。PTs评估和治疗病人。他们使用各种各样的方法，通过运动、热量、水和电来帮助他们更多地了解自己的身体。理疗中心还使用按摩和治疗性运动。作为他们工作的一部分，PTs有潜力在各种环境下工作，包括医院、门诊诊所、学校和疗养院。他们也可能在私人诊所工作，帮助患有慢性疾病的人，如背痛或平衡问题。PTs也可以是其他医疗专业人员的顾问，或从事评估新治疗方法的研究工作。

They use a variety of methods to help them learn more about their bodies through the use of exercise, heat, water, and electricity.
q2.middle: PTs also use massage and therapeutic exercise.
q2.ending: As part of their job, PTs have the potential to work in a variety of settings, including hospitals, outpatient clinics, schools, and nursing homes. They may also work in private practice to aid people with chronic conditions such as bad backs or balance problems. PTs may also be consultants to other medical professionals or work in research to evaluate new treatments.

options.sentence: PTs also use massage and therapeutic exercise.
Physical therapy should be pursued under medical supervision.
The outcome of physical therapy varies from person to person.

options.sentence: Some insurers will reimburse the cost of physical therapy services for some illnesses or injuries.
Physical therapists work with patients for an average of five years after they first begin receiving care.
PTs can work in a variety of settings, including hospitals, outpatient clinics, schools, and nursing homes.
Physical therapists look for possible underlying causes of movement, such as nerve or muscle problems.
